Question #456 (ID: 395643)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\varnothing(x, y, z)=x y^{2} z[/math] এবং [math]\vec{\mathrm{A}}=x z \hat{\mathrm{i} }-x^{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+y z^{2} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয় তবে [math](2,-1,1)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{\partial^{3}}{\partial \mathrm{x}^{2} \partial \mathrm{z}}[/math] নির্ণয় করো

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
)[math]\\[/math]
Solution :[math]\begin{aligned}\varphi \vec{A} & =x y^{2} z\left(x z \hat{i}-x y^{2} \hat{j}+y z^{2} \hat{k}\right) \\& =x^{2} y^{2} z^{2} \hat{i}-x^{2} y^{4} z \hat{j}+x y^{3} z^{3} \hat{k}\end{aligned}[/math]
এখানে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\varphi(x, y, z)=x y^{2} z \\\vec{A}=x z \hat{i}-x y^{2} \hat{j}+y z^{2} \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\frac{\partial}{\partial x}(\varphi A)=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(x^{2} y^{2} z^{2} \hat{i}-x^{2} y^{4} z \hat{j}+\right. \\x y^{3} z^{3} \hat{k} \\=2 x y^{2} z^{2} \hat{i}-2 x y^{4} z \hat{j}+y^{3} z^{3} \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x^{2}}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(2 x y^{2} \cdot z^{z^{2}} \hat{i}-2 x y^{4} z \hat{j}+y^{3} z^{3} \hat{k}\right. \\=2 y^{2} z^{2} \hat{i}-2 y^{4} z \hat{j}+0 \\\therefore \frac{\partial^{3}}{\partial x^{2} \partial z}=\frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(2 y^{2} z^{z^{2}} \hat{i}-2 y^{4} z \hat{j}\right) \\=4 y^{2} \hat{i}-2 y^{4} \hat{j} \\\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore(2,-1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\begin{aligned}\frac{\partial^{3}}{\partial \mathrm{x}^{2} \partial z} & =4 \times(-1)^{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \times(-1)^{4} \hat{\mathrm{j}} \\& =4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-2 \hat{\mathrm{j}} \text { (Ans.) }\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: [math]\varnothing(x,y,z)=x y^{2} z[/math] হলে প্রথমে [math]z[/math] অনুযায়ী ভাগ করলে [math]\varnothing_{z}=x y^{2}[/math] হয়, এরপর [math]x[/math] অনুযায়ী দুইবার ভাগ করলে [math]\varnothing_{zx}=y^{2}[/math] এবং [math]\varnothing_{zxx}=0[/math] পাওয়া যায়। অতএব (2,-1,1) বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{\partial^{3}\varnothing}{\partial x^{2}\partial z}=0[/math].

Question #457 (ID: 395644)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{A}(t)=3 t^{2} \hat{i}-(t+4) \hat{j}+\left(t^{2}-2 t\right) \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\v ec{B}(t)=(\sin[/math] [math]\text { t) } \hat{i}+\left(3 e^{-1}\right) \hat{j}-(3 \cos t) \hat{k}[/math] হয় তবে t =0 সময়ে [math]\frac{d^{2}}{d t^{2}}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=?[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]-30 \hat{i}+14 \hat{j}+20 \hat{k}[/math]
)[math]\\[/math]
Solution :[math]\begin{array}{l}\vec{A}(t)=3 t^{2} \hat{i}-(t+4) \hat{j} \\+\left(t^{2}-2 t\right) \hat{k} \\\vec{B}(t)=(\sin t) \hat{i}+\left(3 e^{-1}\right) \hat{j} \\-(3 \cos t) \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\3 t^{2} & -(t+4) & \left(t^{2}-2 t\right) \\\sin t & 3 \mathrm{e}^{-1} & -(3 \cos t)\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\hat{i}[(3 t \cos t+12 \cos t)-[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\left.\left(3 t^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-t}-6 \mathrm{e}^{-1}\right)\right]-\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left[-9 t^{2} \operatorname{cost}-\left(t^{2} \sin t-\right.\right. \\2 t \sin t)]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left[9 t^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-t}+(t \sin t+4 \sin t)\right]\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\hat{i}\left[3 t \cos t+12 \cos t-3 t^{2} e^{-t}+6 t e^{-t}\right]+\hat{j}\left[9 t^{2} \cos t+\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.t^{2} \sin t-2 t \sin t\right]+\hat{k}\left[9 t^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-1}+t \sin t++4 \sin t\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left[3 \cos t-3 \mathrm{t} \sin t-12 \sin t-6 \mathrm{te}^{-t}+3 \mathrm{t}^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-t}+\right. \\\left.6 \mathrm{e}^{-t}-6 t \mathrm{e}^{-1}\right]+\hat{j}\left[18 t \cos t-9 t^{2} \sin t+2 \sin t+t^{2} \cos t-2 \sin t-\right. \\2 \mathrm{t} \cos t]+\hat{k}\left[18+\mathrm{e}^{-t}-9 \mathrm{t}^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-1}+\sin \mathrm{t}+\mathrm{t} \cos \mathrm{t}+4 \cos \mathrm{t}\right] \\=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left[3 \operatorname{cost}-3 \mathrm{t} \sin t-12 \sin t-12 \mathrm{te}^{-t}+3 \mathrm{t}^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-t}+6 \mathrm{e}^{-1}\right]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[16 \mathrm{t} \\\left.\cos t-9 t^{2} \sin t+t^{2} \cos t+2 t \sin t-2 \sin t\right]+\hat{k}\left[18 t e^{-1}-9 t^{2} e^{-t}+\right. \\\sin t+t \cos t+4 \cos t] \\\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{d t^{2}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left[-3 \sin \mathrm{t}-3 \mathrm{t} \sin t-3 \mathrm{t} \cos t-12 \cos t-12 \mathrm{e}^{-t}\right. \\\left.+12 t \mathrm{e}^{-t}+6 t \mathrm{e}^{-t}-3 \mathrm{t}^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-t}-6 \mathrm{e}^{-1}\right]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[16 \cos t-16 \mathrm{t} \sin t-18 \mathrm{t} \sin t \\\left.-9 \mathrm{t}^{2} \cos t+2 t \cos t-\mathrm{t}^{2} \sin t+2 \sin t+2 \mathrm{t} \cos t-2 \cos t\right]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[18\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\left.e^{-t}-18 t e^{-t}-18 t e^{-t}+9 t^{2} e^{-t}+\cos t+\cos t-t \sin t-4 \sin t\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{dt}^{2}}(\vec{\mathrm{A}} \times \vec{\mathrm{B}})_{t=0}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}[-3 \sin 0-3.0 \sin 0-3 \cdot 0 \cdot \cos 0-12 \cos 0[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\left.-12 \mathrm{e}^{-0}+12 \cdot 0 \cdot \mathrm{e}^{-0}+6.0 \mathrm{e}^{-0}-3 \cdot 0^{2} \mathrm{e}^{-0}-6 \mathrm{e}^{-0}\right]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[16 \cdot \cos 0- \\16.0 \sin 0-18 \cdot 0 \sin 0-9.0^{2} \cdot \cos 0+2 \cdot 0 \cdot \cos 0-0^{2} \cdot \sin 0+2 \sin 0 \\+2.0 \cdot \cos 0-2 \cos 0]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left[18 \mathrm{e}^{-0}-18 \cdot 0 \cdot \mathrm{e}^{-0}-18 \cdot 0 \cdot \mathrm{e}^{-0}+9.0^{2} \cdot \mathrm{e}^{-0}+\right. \\\cos 0+\cos 0-0 \cdot \sin 0-4 \sin 0]\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{dt}^{2}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})_{h=0}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}[-12-12-6]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}[16-2]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}[18+1+1] \\\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}^{2}}{\mathrm{dt}^{2}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})_{1}=0=-30 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+14 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+20 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \text { (Ans.) } \\\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: ক্রস প্রডাক্টের জন্য দ্বিতীয় ধাপের প্রোডাক্ট রুল ব্যবহার করে [math](\vec{A}\times\vec{B})''=\vec{A}''\times\vec{B}+2\vec{A}'\times\vec{B}'+\vec{A}\times\vec{B}''[/math]. এখানে [math]\vec{A}(0)=-4\hat{j},\ \vec{A}'(0)=-\hat{j}-2\hat{k},\ \vec{A}''(0)=6\hat{i}+2\hat{k},\ \vec{B}(0)=\tfrac{3}{e}\hat{j}-3\hat{k},\ \vec{B}'(0)=\hat{i},\ \vec{B}''(0)=3\hat{k}[/math]. এগুলো রেখে প্রতিটি ক্রস গুণ করলে এবং যোগ করলে ফলানুযায়ী [math](\vec{A}\times\vec{B})''_{t=0}=\left(-12-\frac{6}{e}\right)\hat{i}+14\hat{j}+\left(2+\frac{18}{e}\right)\hat{k}[/math] পাওয়া যায়, যা সঠিক কারণ এটি উপরের রুল অনুযায়ী সব অংশের যোগ।

Question #458 (ID: 395645)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{A}\left(x^{2} y z\right) \hat{\mathbf{i}}-\left(2 x z^{3}\right) \hat{j}+\ left(x z^{2}\right) \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{\mathrm{B}}(2 z) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+y \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] [math]\mathrm{x}^{2} \hat{k}[/math] হয় তবে (1, 0, -2) বিন্দুতে [math]\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x \partial y}[/math] নির্ণয় করো ।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]-4 \hat{i}-8 \hat{j}[/math]
)[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে ,[math]\begin{array}{l}\vec{A}=\left(x^{2} y z\right) \hat{i}-\left(2 x z^{3}\right) \hat{j}+\left(x z^{2}\right) \hat{k} \\\vec{B}=(2 z) \hat{i}+y \hat{j}-x^{2} \hat{k} \\\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x \partial y}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=?\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\x^{2} y z & -2 x z^{3} & x z^{2} \\2 z & y & -x^{2}\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\hat{i}\left(2 x^{3} z^{3}-x y z^{2}\right)-\hat{j}[/math]
 [math]\left(-x^{4} y z-2 x z^{4}\right)+\hat{k}\left(x^{2} y^{2}+4 x z^{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\frac{\partial}{\partial y}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=\hat{i}\left(-x z^{2}\right)-\hat{j}\left(-x^{4} z\right)+\hat{k}\left(2 x^{2} y z\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial y}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})\right]=-z^{2} \hat{i}+4 x^{3} \vec{j}+4 x y z \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x \partial y}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=-z^{2} \hat{i}+4 x^{3} z \hat{j}+4 x y z \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x \partial y}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})_{(1,0,-2)}=-(-2)^{2} \hat{i}+4 \cdot 1^{3} \cdot(-2) \hat{\mathrm{j}}+4 \cdot 1 \cdot 0(-2) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x \partial y}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})_{(1,0,-2)}=-4 \hat{i}-8 \hat{j} \text { (Ans.) }[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রথমে ভেক্টরগুলোর গুণফল করে স্কেলার ফাংশন পাই: [math]f=\vec A\cdot\vec B=2x^2yz^2-2xyz^3+x^3z^2[/math]. তাই [math]\partial f/\partial y=2x^2z^2-2xz^3[/math] এবং [math]\partial^2 f/\partial x\partial y=\partial/\partial x(2x^2z^2-2xz^3)=4xz^2-2z^3[/math]. (1,0,-2) এ বসালে [math]4(1)(-2)^2-2(-2)^3=16+16=32[/math].

Question #459 (ID: 395647)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=x^{2} z^{2} \hat{i}-2 y^{2} z^{2} \hat{j}+x y^{2} z \hat{k}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{
 abla} \times(\vec{
abla} \times \vec{A}) ?[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]\left(y^{2}-2 x^{2}\right) \hat{i}+(2 x y+[/math]
 [math]\left.4 y^{2}\right) \hat{j}+(2 x z-8 y z) \hat{k}[/math]
)

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: ব্যবহার করি [math]\nabla\times(\nabla\times A)=\nabla(\nabla\cdot A)-\nabla^2 A[/math]. এখানে [math]A_x=x^2 z^2,\;A_y=-2y^2 z^2,\;A_z=xy^2 z[/math] হলে [math]\nabla\cdot A=2x z^2-4y z^2+xy^2[/math] এবং [math]\nabla(\nabla\cdot A)=(2z^2+y^2)\hat{i}+(-4z^2+2xy)\hat{j}+(4xz-8yz)\hat{k}[/math].  
অন্য দিকে [math]\nabla^2 A=(2z^2+2x^2)\hat{i}+(-4z^2-4y^2)\hat{j}+(2xz)\hat{k}[/math]; তাই পার্থক্য হলে ফল হয় [math]\nabla\times(\nabla\times A)=(y^2-2x^2)\hat{i}+(2xy+4y^2)\hat{j}+(2xz-8yz)\hat{k}[/math]।

Sub-Questions:

Question #460 (ID: 395648)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
প্রমাণ কর যে, (ক) [math]\vec{
abla} \times(\vec{
abla} \times \varnothing)=\vec{0}[/math] এবং (খ) [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{
abla} \times \vec{A})=0[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
Solution :(ক) [math]\vec{
abla} \times \vec{
abla} \varphi[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\vec{
abla} \times\left(\hat{i} \frac{\partial}{\partial x}+\hat{j} \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}}+\hat{k} \frac{\partial}{\partial z}\right) \varphi \\=\vec{
abla} \times\left(\hat{i} \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial x}+\hat{j} \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{y}}+\hat{k} \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial z}\right)\end{array}[/math]
 [math]=\left|\begin{array}{lll}\hat{i} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\frac{\partial}{\partial x} & \frac{\partial}{\partial y} & \frac{\partial}{\partial z} \\\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial x} & \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial y} & \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial z}\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\right)\right]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\right)\right][/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\hat{i}\left(\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial y \partial z}-\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial z \partial y}\right)+\hat{j}\left(\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial z \partial x}-\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial x \partial z}\right)+\hat{k}\left(\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial x \partial y}-\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial x \partial y}\right) \\=\hat{i} .0+\hat{j} \cdot 0+\hat{k} \cdot 0=0 \text { (Proved) }\end{array}[/math]
(খ) ধরি, ভেক্টর , [math]\vec{A}=x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \times \vec{A}=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{\mathrm{k}}\right) \times(\mathrm{x} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\mathrm{y} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\mathrm{z} \hat{\mathrm{k}})[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\frac{\partial}{\partial x} & \frac{\partial}{\partial y} & \frac{\partial}{\partial z} \\\mathrm{x} & \mathrm{y} & \mathbf{z}\end{array}\right| \\=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left\{\frac{\partial}{\partial x}(z)-\frac{\partial}{\partial z}(y)\right\}-\hat{j}\left\{\frac{\partial}{\partial x}(z)-\frac{\partial}{\partial z}(x)\right\}+\hat{k}\left\{\frac{\partial}{\partial x}(y)-\frac{\partial}{\partial z}(x)\right\} \\=0\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \cdot(\vec{
abla} \times \vec{\mathrm{A}})=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{\mathrm{k}}\right) \cdot 0[/math]
 [math]=0 \text { (Proved) }[/math]


Explanation:
ক [math]\nabla\times(\nabla\phi)=\mathbf{0}[/math] কারণ প্রতিটি উপাদান হল মিশ্র আংশিক অপরিভর্ত্যতার পার্থক্য, উদাহরণস্বরূপ [math](\nabla\times\nabla\phi)_x=\partial_y\partial_z\phi-\partial_z\partial_y\phi=0[/math] যদি [math]\phi[/math] পর্যাপ্তভাবে মসৃণ থাকে (মিশ্র আংশিকগুলি সমান)।

খ [math]\nabla\cdot(\nabla\times\mathbf{A})=0[/math] কারণ বিস্তারের লেখায় প্রতিটি টার্ম মিশ্র আংশিকের পার্থক্য হিসেবে বাতিল হয়ে যায়, উদাহরণস্বরূপ [math]\nabla\cdot(\nabla\times\mathbf{A})=\partial_x(\partial_y A_z-\partial_z A_y)+\cdots=0[/math] (মিশ্র আংশিকদের সমতা অনুযায়ী)।

Sub-Questions:

Question #461 (ID: 395649)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দেখাও যে , [math]\vec{A}=\left(2 x^{2}+8 x y^{2} z\right) \hat{i}+\left(3 x^{3} y-3 x y\ri ght) \hat{j}-\left(4 y^{2} z^{2}\right.[/math] [math]\left.+2 \mathrm{x}^{3} z\right) \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] ভেক্টরটি সলিনয়ডাল নয় কিন্তু [math]\vec{B}=\left(x y z^{2}\right) \vec{A}[/math] ভেক্টরটি সলিনয়ডাল।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
Solution :দেওয়া আছে, [math]\vec{A}=\left(2 x^{2}+8 x y^{2} z\right) \hat{i}+\left(3 x^{3} y-3 x y\right) \hat{\mathrm{i}}-[/math]
 [math]\left(4 y^{2} z^{2}+2 x^{3} z\right) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{\mathrm{A}}=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{z}} \hat{\mathrm{k}}\right) \cdot\left[\left(2 \mathrm{x}^{2}+8 x y^{2} z\right) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\left(3 \mathrm{x}^{3} \mathrm{y}-3 x \mathrm{xy}\right) \hat{\mathrm{j}}\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.-\left(4 y^{2} z^{2}+2 x^{3} z\right) \hat{k}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{A}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(2 x^{2}+8 x y^{2} z\right)+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(3 x^{3} y-3 x y\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(4 y^{2} z^{2}+2 x^{3} z\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{A}=4 x+8 y^{2} z+3 x^{3}-3 x-8 y^{2} z-2 x^{3}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{A}=x^{3}+x[/math]
x এর যেকোনো মানের জন্য [math]\left(x^{3}+x\right)[/math]
 রাশিটি শূন্য নয়। অর্থাৎ, [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{A} 
eq 0[/math]
 হওয়ায় [math]\vec{A}[/math]
 সলিনয়ডাল নয়।আবার , [math]\vec{\mathrm{B}}=\left(x y z^{2}\right) \vec{A}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\left.\vec{B}=\left(x y z^{2}\right)\left[2 x^{-2}+8 x y^{2} z\right) \hat{i}+\left(3 x^{3} y-3 x y\right) \hat{j}-\left(4 y^{2} z^{2}+2 x^{3} z\right) \hat{k}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{B}=\left(2 x^{3} y z^{2}+8 x^{2} y^{3} z^{3}\right) \hat{i}+\left(3 x^{4} y^{2} z^{2}-3 x^{2} y^{2} z^{2}\right) \hat{j}-\left(4 x y^{3} z^{4}+\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.2 x^{4} y z^{3}\right) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{z}} \hat{\mathrm{k}}\right) \cdot\left[2 \mathrm{x}^{3} y z^{2}+8 \mathrm{x}^{2} y^{3} z^{3}\right) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\left(3 \mathrm{x}^{4} y^{2} z^{2}-\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\left.3 x^{2} y^{2} z^{2}\right) \hat{j}-\left(4 x y^{3} z^{4}+2 x^{4} y z^{3}\right) \hat{k}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{B}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(2 x^{3} y z^{2}+8 x^{2} y^{2} z^{3}\right)+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(3 x^{4} y^{2} z^{2}-3 x^{2} y^{2} z^{2}\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial z}[/math]
 [math]\left(4 x y^{3} z^{4}+2 x^{4} y z^{3}\right)[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{B}=6 x^{2} y z^{2}+16 x y^{3} z^{3}+6 x^{4} y z^{2}-6 x^{2} y z^{2}-16 x y^{3} z^{3}-6 x^{4} y z^{2}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{B}=0[/math]
 হওয়ায় [math]\vec{\mathrm{B}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরটি সলিনয়ডাল।

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: [math]∇·\vec{A}=\frac{∂}{∂x}(2x^{2}+8xy^{2}z)+\frac{∂}{∂y}(3x^{3}y-3xy)+\frac{∂}{∂z}(-4y^{2}z^{2}-2x^{3}z)=(4x+8y^{2}z)+(3x^{3}-3x)-(8y^{2}z+2x^{3})=x+x^{3}[/math], যা সাধারণভাবে শূন্য নয়, তাই [math]\vec{A}[/math] সলিনয়ডাল নয়।  
এখন [math]f=xyz^{2}[/math] নিলে [math]\vec{B}=f\vec{A}[/math] এবং [math]∇·(f\vec{A})=∇f·\vec{A}+f∇·\vec{A}[/math]। এখানে সরাসরি গণনায় [math]∇f·\vec{A}=-x^{2}yz^{2}-x^{4}yz^{2}=-f(x+x^{3})=-f∇·\vec{A}[/math], ফলে [math]∇·\vec{B}=0[/math] এবং [math]\vec{B}[/math] সলিনয়ডাল।

Question #462 (ID: 395650)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\varnothing=\left(x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}\right) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\vec{
abla} \varnothing=?[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math](2-r) e^{-r} \vec{r}[/math]
)[math]\\[/math]
Solution :দেওয়া আছে,[math]\varnothing=\left(x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}\right) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \varnothing=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right)\left(x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}\right) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \varnothing=\hat{\mathrm{i}} \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\left[\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{y}^{2}+\mathrm{z}^{2}\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}} \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\left(\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{y}^{2}+\mathrm{z}^{2}\right)\right.[/math]
 [math]e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z}}+\hat{k} \frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left[\left(x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}\right) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \varnothing=\hat{i}\left[2 x e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z}}+\left(x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}\right)(-1) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}}+y^{2}+z^{2}}\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\frac{2 x}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\right][/math]
 [math]+\hat{j}\left[2 y e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}+\left(x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}\right)(-1) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\frac{2 y+}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\right][/math]
 [math]+\hat{k}\left[2 z e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z}}+\left(x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}\right)(-1) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.\frac{2 z+}{2 \sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\right][/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \varnothing=2 x e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}} \hat{i}-x\left(\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}\right) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z}} \hat{i} 2 y[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}\mathrm{e}^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\mathrm{y}\left(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{2}+\mathrm{y}^{2}+\mathrm{z}^{2}}\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\hat{\mathrm{j}}^{2}+2 z \\\mathrm{e}^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}} \hat{\mathrm{k}}-\mathrm{z}\left(\sqrt{\mathrm{x}^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}\right) \mathrm{e}^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}} \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore \vec{
abla} \varnothing=2(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}) e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}-(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}) \\\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}} e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\end{array}[/math]
এখানে, [math]x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z=\vec{r}, \sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}=r[/math]
 এবং [math]e^{-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z}}=e^{-t}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \varnothing=2 \vec{r} \mathrm{e}^{-r}-\vec{r} \mathrm{re}^{-r}=(2-\mathrm{r}) \mathrm{e}^{-\mathrm{r}} \overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}} \text { (Ans.) }[/math]


Explanation:
কারণ [math]\varnothing(r)=r^{2}e^{-r}[/math] কেবলমাত্র [math]r=\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}[/math] উপর নির্ভর করে, তাই [math]\nabla\varnothing=f'(r)\hat r[/math]. এখানে [math]f'(r)=\frac{d}{dr}(r^{2}e^{-r})=e^{-r}(2r-r^{2})[/math], ফলে

[math]\nabla\varnothing=e^{- \sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}}\bigl(2-\sqrt{x^{2}+y^{2}+z^{2}}\bigr)\langle x,y,z\rangle.[/math]

Question #463 (ID: 395651)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \ hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] এর মান নির্ণয় কর।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]5 \sqrt{2}[/math]
)[math]\\[/math]
Solution :দেওয়া আছে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=4 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+5 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\therefore|\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}|=\sqrt{4^{2}+(-3)^{2}+5^{2}}=5 \sqrt{2} \text { (Ans.) }\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: কোনো ভেক্টরের মান হচ্ছে তার উপাদানগুলোর বর্গের যোগফলের বর্গমূল, তাই [math]|\overrightarrow{A}|=\sqrt{4^2+(-3)^2+5^2}=\sqrt{16+9+25}=\sqrt{50}=5\sqrt{2}[/math].

Question #464 (ID: 395652)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো কণার অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\vec{r}=2 t \hat{i}+3 t^{2} \hat{j}[/math] হলে কণাটির বেগ ও ত্বর ণ নির্ণয় করো।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
(Answer : বেগ [math]2 \hat{i}+6 t \hat{j}[/math]
 ত্বরণ [math]6 \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
)[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে,অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+3 \mathrm{t}^{\hat{\mathrm{j}}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
বেগ [math]\vec{V}=\frac{d}{d t}(\vec{r})[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(2 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left(3 \mathrm{t}^{2}\right) \hat{\mathrm{j}} \\=2 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+6 \mathrm{t} \hat{\mathrm{j}}\end{array}[/math]
ত্বরণ [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{a}}=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\vec{v})=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(2) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(6 \mathrm{t}) \hat{\mathrm{j}}=6 \hat{\mathrm{j}} \text { (Ans.) }[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: অবস্থান ভেক্টরের উপাদানগুলোর সময় অনুসারে ডেরিভেটিভ নিয়ে বেগ হয়, তাই [math]\vec{v}=\dfrac{d\vec{r}}{dt}=2\hat{i}+6t\hat{j}[/math] (কারণ [math]d(2t)/dt=2,\, d(3t^2)/dt=6t[/math]). এরপর বেগের ডেরিভেটিভ নিয়ে ত্বরণ হয়, তাই [math]\vec{a}=\dfrac{d\vec{v}}{dt}=6\hat{j}[/math] (কারণ [math]d(6t)/dt=6[/math]).

Question #465 (ID: 395653)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
কোনো কণার অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\left[\left(3.0 \mathrm{~ ms}^{-1}\right) \mathrm{t}+4.2 \mathrm{~m}\right] \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math] [math]+\left(5.3 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math] হলে বেগ [math]\vec{V}[/math] নির্ণয় করো।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
(Answer : [math]\left(3 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) \hat{\mathrm{i}}[/math]
)[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে,অবস্থান ভেক্টর, [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\left[\left(3.0 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right)\right.[/math]
 [math]\mathrm{t}+4.2 \mathrm{~m}] \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\left(5.3 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) \hat{\mathrm{j}}[/math]
বেগ [math]\vec{V}=?[/math]
আমরা জানি,[math]\begin{aligned}\overrightarrow{\mathrm{v}} & =\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}) \\& =\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left[\left(3.0 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) \mathrm{t}+\right. \\& 4.2 \mathrm{~m}] \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left(5.3 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) \hat{\mathrm{j}} \\& =\left(3 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}+0\right) \hat{\mathrm{i}}+(0) \hat{\mathrm{j}} \\& =\left(3 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) \hat{\mathrm{i}}(\text { Ans. })\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:
বেগ হলো অবস্থান ভেক্টরের সময় অনুযায়ী অনুপাত, তাই [math]\vec V=\dfrac{d\vec r}{dt}[/math]. প্রথম অংশ থেকে [math]\dfrac{d}{dt}\big((3.0\ \mathrm{ms^{-1}})\,t\big)=3.0\ \mathrm{ms^{-1}}[/math] এবং ধ্রুবক অংশগুলোর সময় অনুযায়ী অনুপাত শূন্য, ফলে [math]\vec V=3.0\,\hat{\imath}\ \mathrm{ms^{-1}}.[/math]

Question #466 (ID: 395654)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\varphi=2 x y^{4}-x^{2} z[/math] হয়, তবে (2-1, 2) বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla}_{\varphi}[/math] নি র্ণয় করো।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]-(6 \hat{i}+16 \hat{j}+4 \hat{k})[/math])

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: গ্র্যাজিয়েন্ট হচ্ছে স্কেলার ফাংশনের আংশিক উৎপন্নগুলোর ভেক্টর, তাই প্রথমে বের করি [math]\partial_x\varphi=2y^4-2xz,\;\partial_y\varphi=8xy^3,\;\partial_z\varphi=-x^2[/math]. এসবকে বিন্দুতে [math](x,y,z)=(2,-1,2)[/math] বসালে পাই [math]\nabla\varphi(2,-1,2)=\langle-6,-16,-4\rangle[/math], কারণ [math]2( {-1})^4-2\cdot2\cdot2=-6,\;8\cdot2\cdot({-1})^3=-16,\;-2^2=-4[/math].

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #467 (ID: 395655)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=x \hat{\mathrm{i}}+y \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\math rm{z} \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{r}[/math] বের করো।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : 3)

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: ডাইভার্জেন্স হল প্রতিটি ঘনাধিক ভেক্টর উপাদানের আংশিক অস্পষ্টতার যোগ; এখানে [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=x \hat{\mathrm{i}}+y \hat{\mathrm{j}}+z \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math], তাই [math]\vec{\nabla}\cdot\vec{r}=\frac{\partial x}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial y}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial z}{\partial z}=1+1+1=3[/math].

Question #468 (ID: 395656)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{r}}=\left(3 x^{2} z\right) \hat{i}+(x y z) \hat{j}-\left(x^{3} y^{2} z\right) \hat{k}[/math] হয়, তবে (2-1,2) বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla} . \vec{r}[/math] নির্ণয় করো।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : 20)

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: ডাইভারজেন্স হলো অংশীয় অপরিবর্তনগুলোর summa, তাই [math]\nabla\cdot\vec r=\partial_x(3x^2z)+\partial_y(xyz)+\partial_z(-x^3y^2z)=6xz+xz-x^3y^2=7xz-x^3y^2[/math]. বিন্দুতে [math](2,-1,2)[/math] প্রয়োগ করলে [math]7\cdot2\cdot2-2^3\cdot(-1)^2=28-8=20[/math] ফলে উত্তর [math]20[/math].

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #469 (ID: 395657)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{A}=4 x y z \hat{i}+2 x^{2} \hat{y}-x^{2} y^{2} z \hat{k}[/math] হয়, তবে (2-2-1 ) বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla} \times \vec{A}[/math] নির্ণয় করো।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math](16 \hat{i}+32 \hat{j}+8 \hat{k})[/math])

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: কর্লের সূত্র ব্যবহার করে [math]\nabla\times\vec A=(\partial A_z/\partial y-\partial A_y/\partial z)\hat i+(\partial A_x/\partial z-\partial A_z/\partial x)\hat j+(\partial A_y/\partial x-\partial A_x/\partial y)\hat k[/math] পাওয়া যায়; এই ভেক্টরের জন্য তা সরলীকরণ করলে [math]\nabla\times\vec A=(-2x^2yz)\hat i+(4xy+2xy^2z)\hat j+4x(1-z)\hat k[/math] হয়। [math](x,y,z)=(2,-2,1)[/math] বসালে জেড ও ওয়াই কম্পোনেন্টগুলো শূন্য হয়ে যায় এবং ফলাফল [math]\nabla\times\vec A=16\hat i[/math] পাওয়া যায়।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #470 (ID: 395658)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\overrightarrow{\mathrm{V}}=V_{x} \hat{i}+V_{y} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+V_{z} \ hat{k}[/math] হয়, তবে দেখাও যে, [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot(\vec{
abla} \times[/math] [math]\vec{V})=0[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
Solution :এখানে, [math]\vec{V}=V_{x} \hat{i}+V_{y} \hat{j}+V_{z} \hat{k}[/math]
দেখাতে হবে, [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot(\vec{
abla} \times \vec{V})=0[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \times \vec{V}=\left|\begin{array}{lll}\hat{i} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}} & \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}} & \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{z}} \\\mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{x}} & \mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{y}} & \mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{z}}\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(\frac{\partial \mathrm{V}_{z}}{\partial \mathrm{y}}-\frac{\partial \mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{x}}}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\right)-\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left(\frac{\partial \mathrm{V}_{2}}{\partial \mathrm{x}}=\frac{\partial \mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{x}}}{\partial z}\right)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left(\frac{\partial \mathrm{V}_{x}}{\partial \mathrm{x}}-\frac{\partial \mathrm{V}_{\mathrm{x}}}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\right) \\=0-0+0=0\end{array}[/math]
এখন , [math]\vec{
abla} .0=0[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{
abla} \cdot(\vec{
abla} \times \vec{v})=0[/math]
 (দেখানো হলো)

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রথমে [math]\nabla \times \vec{V}=(\frac{\partial V_z}{\partial y}-\frac{\partial V_y}{\partial z})\hat{i}+(\frac{\partial V_x}{\partial z}-\frac{\partial V_z}{\partial x})\hat{j}+(\frac{\partial V_y}{\partial x}-\frac{\partial V_x}{\partial y})\hat{k}[/math] হয়। এরপর তার ডাইভার্জেন্স নিলে সমস্ত টার্মগুলো মিলিয়ে পাওয়া যায় [math]\frac{\partial^2 V_z}{\partial x\partial y}-\frac{\partial^2 V_y}{\partial x\partial z}+\frac{\partial^2 V_x}{\partial y\partial z}-\frac{\partial^2 V_z}{\partial y\partial x}+\frac{\partial^2 V_y}{\partial z\partial x}-\frac{\partial^2 V_x}{\partial z\partial y}=0[/math], কারণ সাধারণ ধরণের ফাংশনের জন্য মিশ্র দ্বৈত আংশিক অবকাঠামো সমান (Clairaut এর থিওরেম), তাই [math]\nabla\cdot(\nabla\times\vec V)=0[/math]।

Question #471 (ID: 395659)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\varphi(x, y, z)=3 x y^{2} z^{3}-4 x y[/math] হয়, তবে [math]\vec{
abla}_{\varphi}[/math] বের করে। (2,-1, 1) বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla}_{\varphi}[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]7 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-20 \hat{\mathrm{j}}+18 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math])

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: গ্রেডিয়েন্ট হলো আংশিক ডেরিভেটিভের ভেক্টর; এখানে [math]\frac{\partial\varphi}{\partial x}=3y^{2}z^{3}-4y,\ \frac{\partial\varphi}{\partial y}=6xyz^{3}-4x,\ \frac{\partial\varphi}{\partial z}=9xy^{2}z^{2}[/math], তাই [math]\nabla\varphi=(3y^{2}z^{3}-4y,\ 6xyz^{3}-4x,\ 9xy^{2}z^{2})[/math]. বিন্দু [math](2,-1,1)[/math]-এ বসালে [math]\nabla\varphi(2,-1,1)=(7,-20,18)[/math]।

Question #472 (ID: 395660)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি একটি ভেক্টর রাশি [math]\vec{r}=2 t^{2} \hat{i}+\left(t^{2}-4 t\right) \hat{j}+(3 t-5) \hat{k}[/math] হয় তবে [math]\frac{\mathrm{d} \overrightarrow{\mathbf{r}}}{\mathrm{dt}}[/math] কত ?

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]4 t \hat{i}+(2 t-4) \hat{j}+3 t \hat{k}[/math])

Explanation:
প্রতিটি ভেক্টর উপাদানকে সময় অনুযায়ী পৃথকভাবে ডিফারেনশিয়েট করলে পাওয়ায়: [math]\frac{d}{dt}(2t^2)=4t,\;\frac{d}{dt}(t^2-4t)=2t-4,\;\frac{d}{dt}(3t-5)=3[/math]; তাই
[math]\frac{d\vec r}{dt}=4t\,\hat{i}+(2t-4)\,\hat{j}+3\,\hat{k}[/math].

Sub-Questions:

Question #473 (ID: 395661)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দুটি ভেক্টর [math]\vec{P}=\hat{i} t^{2}-\hat{j} t+\hat{k}(2 t+1)[/math] এবং [math]\vec{Q}=\hat{i} 5 t+ \hat{j} t[/math] [math]-\hat{\mathrm{k}}^{}\ t^{3}[/math] হলে [math]\frac{\mathrm{d}}{d t}(\vec{P} \cdot \vec{Q})[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d}{d t}(\vec{P} \times \vec{Q})[/math] নির্ণয় কর ।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
(Answaer : [math]-8 t^{3}+12 t^{2}-2 t[/math]
 , ও [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(4 \mathrm{t}^{3}-4 \mathrm{t}-1\right)+\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left(5 \mathrm{t}^{4}+20 \mathrm{t}+5\right)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left(3 \mathrm{t}^{2}+10 \mathrm{t}\right)[/math]
 )[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে,[math]\begin{array}{r}\vec{A}=\hat{i t}^{2}-\hat{j} t+(2 t+1) \hat{k} \\\quad \vec{B}=5 \hat{i} t+\hat{j} t-\hat{k} t^{3}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{r}\therefore \frac{d}{d t}(\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B})=? \\\quad \frac{d}{d t}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=?\end{array}[/math]
এখন,[math]\begin{aligned}\vec{A} \cdot \vec{B} & =A_{x} B_{x}+A_{y} B_{y}+A_{z} B_{z} \\& =\left(t^{2}\right)(5 t)+(-t)(t)+(2 t+1)\left(-t^{3}\right) \\& =5 t^{3}-t^{2}-2 t^{4}-t^{3}=-2 t^{4}+4 t^{3}-t^{2}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left(-2 \mathrm{t}^{4}+4 \mathrm{t}^{3}-\mathrm{t}^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=-2 \times 4 t^{3}+4 \times\left(3 t^{2}\right)-2 t=-8 t^{3}+12 t^{2}-2 t \text { (Ans.) }[/math]
আবার,[math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\t^{2} & -t & (2 t+1) \\5 t & t & -t^{3}\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}\left\{(-t)\left(-t^{3}\right)-(2 t+1) t\right\}-\hat{j}\left\{\left(t^{2}\right)\left(-t^{3}\right)\right.[/math]
 [math]-(2 \mathrm{t}+1)(5 \mathrm{t})\}+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left\{\left(\mathrm{t}^{2}\right)(\mathrm{t})-(-\mathrm{t})(5 \mathrm{t})\right\}[/math]
 [math]=\hat{i}\left(t^{4}-2 t^{2}-t\right)-\hat{j}\left(-t^{5}-10 t^{2}-5 t\right)+\hat{k}\left(t^{3}+5 t^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}})[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left\{\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(\mathrm{t}^{4}-2 \mathrm{t}^{2}-\mathrm{t}\right)-\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left(-\mathrm{t}^{5}-10 \mathrm{t}^{2}-5 \mathrm{t}\right)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left(\mathrm{t}^{3}+5 \mathrm{t}^{2}\right)\right\} \\=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(4 \mathrm{t}^{3}-4 . t-1\right)-\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left(-5 \mathrm{t}^{4}-20 \mathrm{t}-5\right)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left(3 \mathrm{t}^{2}+10 \mathrm{t}\right) \\=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(4 \mathrm{t}^{3}-4 \mathrm{t}-1\right)+\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left(5 \mathrm{t}^{4}+20 \mathrm{t}+5\right)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left(3 \mathrm{t}^{2}+10 \mathrm{t}\right) \text { (Ans.) }\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
সমাধান: ব্যবহার করি [math]\frac{d}{dt}(\vec P\cdot\vec Q)=\vec P'\cdot\vec Q+\vec P\cdot\vec Q'[/math] এবং [math]\frac{d}{dt}(\vec P\times\vec Q)=\vec P'\times\vec Q+\vec P\times\vec Q'[/math], যেখানে [math]\vec P'=(2t,-1,2)[/math] এবং [math]\vec Q'=(5,1,-3t^2)[/math]. গণনা করে পাই:

ক [math]\frac{d}{dt}(\vec P\cdot\vec Q)=-8t^3+12t^2-2t[/math].

খ [math]\frac{d}{dt}(\vec P\times\vec Q)=\hat{i}(4t^3-4t-1)+\hat{j}(5t^4+20t+5)+\hat{k}(3t^2+10t)[/math].

ব্যাখ্যা: প্রতিটি ক্ষেত্রেই ভেক্টর গুণের সময়-নিয়ম প্রয়োগ করে প্রথমে অংশগুলোর ডেরিভেটিভ নিয়ে তাদের ডট ও ক্রস গুণ করে যোগ করা হয়েছে।

Question #474 (ID: 395663)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{\mathrm{A}}=2 x^{2} \hat{i}-3 y z \hat{j}+x^{2} \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\varphi=2 z-x^{2} y[/math] তাহলে ( 1, -1, 1) বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \vec{
abla}_{\varphi}[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : 5)

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রথমে [math]\varphi=2z-x^{2}y[/math] থেকে [math]\nabla\varphi=(\partial_{x}\varphi)\hat{i}+(\partial_{y}\varphi)\hat{j}+(\partial_{z}\varphi)\hat{k}=(-2xy)\hat{i}+(-x^{2})\hat{j}+2\hat{k}[/math]. তাই
[math]\vec{A}\cdot\nabla\varphi=(2x^{2})(-2xy)+(-3yz)(-x^{2})+(x^{2})(2)=-4x^{3}y+3x^{2}yz+2x^{2}[/math]. (1,−1,1) এ substitute করলে [math]-4(1)^{3}(-1)+3(1)^{2}(-1)(1)+2(1)^{2}=4-3+2=3[/math], अतএব মানটি 3।

Question #475 (ID: 395664)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
যদি [math]\vec{A}=x^{2} z \hat{i}-2 y^{3} z^{2} \hat{j}+x y^{2} z \hat{k}[/math] হয় তবে, (1, - 1 ,1 ) বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \mathrm{A}[/math] কত?

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{A}=-3[/math])

Explanation:
সমাধান: দিবর্জেন্স হচ্ছে ভেক্টর ক্ষেত্রের উপাদানগুলোর আংশিক অন্তরনের যোগ, তাই
[math]\nabla\cdot\vec{A}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}(x^{2}z)+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}(-2y^{3}z^{2})+\frac{\partial}{\partial z}(xy^{2}z)=2xz-6y^{2}z^{2}+xy^{2}.[/math]
বিন্দু (1,-1,1)-এ তা মূল্যায়ন করলে [math]2\cdot1\cdot1-6\cdot(-1)^{2}\cdot1^{2}+1\cdot(-1)^{2}=2-6+1=-3[/math], অতএব উত্তর [math]-3[/math].

Question #476 (ID: 395665)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দেখাও যে, [math]\operatorname{div} \vec{r}=3[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
Solution :ব্যাসার্ধ ভেক্টর, [math]\vec{r}=x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}[/math]
ভেক্টর অপারেটর, [math]\vec{
abla}=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right)[/math]
এখন, [math]\operatorname{div} \vec{\mathrm{r}}=\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{\mathrm{r}}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right) \cdot(x \hat{i}+y \hat{j}+z \hat{k}) \\=\frac{\partial x}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial y}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial z}{\partial z}=1+1+1=3\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \operatorname{div} \vec{r}=3 \quad \text { [Showed] }[/math]


Explanation:
[math]\vec r=x\mathbf{i}+y\mathbf{j}+z\mathbf{k}[/math] তাই [math]\operatorname{div}\vec r=\frac{\partial x}{\partial x}+\frac{\partial y}{\partial y}+\frac{\partial z}{\partial z}=1+1+1=3[/math].

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #477 (ID: 395666)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি কণা এমনভাবে চলে যে, তার অবস্থান ভেক্টর [math]\vec{r}=\hat{i} \cos \omega t+\hat{j} \sin \omega t[/math] (যেখানে [math]{\omega}[/math]একটি ধ্রুবক)। দেখাও যে, [math]\vec{r}[/math] ও [math]\vec{v}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব এবং [math]\vec{r}\times[/math] [math]\vec{v}[/math] ধ্রুব ভেক্টর।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
Solution :দেওয়া আছে,[math]\vec{r}=\hat{i} \cos \omega t+\hat{j} \sin \omega t[/math]
বেগ [math]\vec{v}=?[/math]
ত্বরণ [math]\vec{a}=?[/math]
আমরা জানি,[math]\begin{aligned}\vec{v} & =\frac{d \vec{r}}{d t} \\& =\frac{d}{d t}(\hat{i} \cos \omega t+\hat{j} \sin \omega t)\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{d}{d t}(\hat{i} \cos \omega t)+\frac{d}{d t}(\hat{j} \sin \omega t) \\=-\omega \hat{i} \sin \omega t+\omega \hat{j} \cos \omega t \\=\omega(-\hat{i} \sin \omega t+\hat{j} \cos \omega t) \text { (Ans. ) }\end{array}[/math]
এবং[math]\begin{aligned}\vec{a} & =\frac{d \vec{v}}{d t} \\& =\frac{d}{d t}\{\omega(-\hat{i} \sin \omega t+\hat{j} \cos \omega t)\} \\& =\omega(-\omega \hat{i} \cos \omega t-\omega \hat{j} \sin \omega t) \\& =-\omega^{2}(\hat{i} \cos \omega t+\hat{j} \sin \omega t)=-\omega^{2} \vec{r} \text { (Ans.) }\end{aligned}[/math]
পুনরায় ,[math]\vec{\mathrm{r}} \times \vec{\mathrm{v}}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\cos \omega t & \sin \omega t & 0 \\-\omega \sin \omega t & \omega \cos \omega t & 0\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]=\hat{k}\left(\omega \cos ^{2} \omega t+\omega \sin ^{2} \omega t\right)[/math]
 [math]=\hat{\mathrm{k}} \omega=[/math]
 একটি ধ্রুবক ভেক্টর (প্রমাণিত)

Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: প্রথমে গতি নির্ণয় করি: [math]\vec{v}=\frac{d\vec{r}}{dt}=-\omega\hat{i}\sin\omega t+\omega\hat{j}\cos\omega t[/math], তাই [math]\vec{r}\cdot\vec{v}=\cos\omega t(-\omega\sin\omega t)+\sin\omega t(\omega\cos\omega t)=0[/math], ফলে [math]\vec{r}[/math] ও [math]\vec{v}[/math] পরস্পর লম্ব। এছাড়া ক্রস প্রোডাক্টে কেবল জেড কোর উপাদান থাকে: [math]\vec{r}\times\vec{v}=\hat{k}\,\omega(\cos^2\omega t+\sin^2\omega t)=\omega\hat{k}[/math], যা একটি ধ্রুব ভেক্টর।

Sub-Questions:

Question #478 (ID: 395667)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
(1, 1, - 1) বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{A}=x^{2} \hat{i}-2 x^{3} y z \hat{j}+3 y z^{3} \hat{k}[/math] এর কার্ল নির্ণয় কর।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]\vec{
abla} \times \vec{A}=-\hat{i}-2 \hat{j}+6 \hat{k}[/math])

Explanation:
কার্ল নির্ণয়ের সূত্র প্রয়োগ করলে [math]\nabla\times\vec A=\begin{vmatrix}\hat i&\hat j&\hat k\\ \partial_x&\partial_y&\partial_z\\ x^2&-2x^3yz&3yz^3\end{vmatrix}[/math] পাওয়া যায়। তাই উপাদানগুলো হচ্ছে [math](\nabla\times\vec A)_x=3z^3+2x^3y,\;(\nabla\times\vec A)_y=0,\;(\nabla\times\vec A)_z=-6x^2yz[/math]। (1,1,-1)তে বসালে [math]\nabla\times\vec A(1,1,-1)=-\hat i+6\hat k[/math] হয়, কারণ কেবল অংশগুলোর আংশিক অবক্রমণ নেয়া হয়েছে।

Question #479 (ID: 395668)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{V}=3 x^{2} \hat{\imath}+(4 x y+5 z) \hat{j}+\left(6 y^{2}-7 x\right) \hat{k}[/math] হলে, [math]Curl \ \vec{V}[/math] নির্ণয় কর।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]\vec{
abla} \times \vec{v}=(12 y-5) \hat{i}+7 \hat{j}+4 y \hat{k}[/math])

Explanation:
সমাধান: রোটেশন নেওয়ার সূত্রটি ব্যবহার করি [math]\nabla\times\vec V=(\partial_y V_z-\partial_z V_y)\,\hat\imath+(\partial_z V_x-\partial_x V_z)\,\hat\jmath+(\partial_x V_y-\partial_y V_x)\,\hat k[/math]. এখানে [math]V_x=3x^2,\ V_y=4xy+5z,\ V_z=6y^2-7x[/math] হলে উপাদানগুলো গণনা করলে [math]\hat\imath:\;12y-5,\ \hat\jmath:\;7,\ \hat k:\;4y[/math] পাওয়া যায়। তাই [math]\nabla\times\vec V=(12y-5)\hat\imath+7\hat\jmath+4y\hat k[/math], কারণ প্রতিটি উপাদান পার্শ্বিক অবকলজকে অনুসারে সহজভাবে হিসাব করা হয়েছে।

Sub-Questions:

Question #480 (ID: 395670)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
দেখাও যে, [math]\vec{
abla} \times(\vec{
abla} \varphi)=0[/math] । অথবা, [math]\text { Curl} \v arphi=0[/math] ।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
Solution :[math]\text { (ii) } \vec{
abla} \times \vec{
abla} \varphi[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\vec{
abla} \times\left(\hat{i} \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}} \cdot \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\right) \varphi \\=\vec{
abla} \times\left(\hat{i} \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x}}+\hat{\mathrm{j}} \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{y}}+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\right) \text {. } \\=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\\frac{\partial}{\partial x} & \frac{\partial}{\partial y} & \frac{\partial}{\partial z} \\\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial x} & \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial y} & \frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial z}\end{array}\right| \\\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\right)\right]+\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{z}}\right)\right] \\+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left[\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\right)-\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}}\left(\frac{\partial \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x}}\right)\right] \\=\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{y} \partial \mathrm{z}}-\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial z \partial \mathrm{y}}\right)+\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left(\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial z \partial \mathrm{x}}-\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x} \partial \mathrm{z}}\right)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left(\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x} \partial \mathrm{y}}-\frac{\partial^{2} \varphi}{\partial \mathrm{x} \partial \mathrm{y}}\right) \\=\hat{\mathrm{i}} \cdot 0+\hat{\mathrm{j}} \cdot 0+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \cdot 0=0\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: [math]\nabla\times(\nabla\varphi)=\Big(\frac{\partial^2\varphi}{\partial y\partial z}-\frac{\partial^2\varphi}{\partial z\partial y},\;\frac{\partial^2\varphi}{\partial z\partial x}-\frac{\partial^2\varphi}{\partial x\partial z},\;\frac{\partial^2\varphi}{\partial x\partial y}-\frac{\partial^2\varphi}{\partial y\partial x}\Big)[/math]. প্রতিটি উপাদানই শূন্য কারণ পর্যাপ্ত মসৃণতার জন্য মিশ্র আংশিক ডেরিভেটিভগুলির আদেশ বিনিমেয়, তাই [math]\nabla\times(\nabla\varphi)=0[/math].

Question #481 (ID: 395671)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\phi=2 x^{3} y^{2} z^{4}[/math] হলে [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{
abla} \phi[/math] নির্ণয় করো।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
(Answer : [math]12 x y^{2} z^{4}+4 x^{3} z^{4}+24 x^{3} y^{2} z^{2}[/math]
 )[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে,[math]\phi=2 x^{3} y^{2} z^{4}[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla}_{\phi}=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right)\left(2 x^{3} y^{2} z^{4}\right)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(2 x^{3} y^{2} z^{4}\right) \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(2 x^{3} y^{2} z^{4}\right) \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(2 x^{3} y^{2} z^{4}\right) \hat{k} \\=6 x^{2} y^{2} z^{4} \hat{i}+4 x^{3} y z^{4} \hat{j}+8 x^{3} y^{2} z^{3} \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]
এখন,[math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{
abla} \phi=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right) \cdot\left(6 x^{2} y^{2} z^{4} \hat{i}+4 x^{3} y z^{4} \hat{j}\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.+8 x^{3} y^{2} z^{3} \hat{k}\right)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(6 x^{2} y^{2} z^{4}\right)+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(4 x^{3} y z^{4}\right)+\frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(8 x^{3} y^{2} z^{3}\right) \\=12 x y^{2} z^{4}+4 x^{3} z^{4}+24 x^{3} y^{2} z^{2} \text { (Ans.) }\end{array}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: এখানে [math]\nabla\cdot\nabla\phi=\nabla^{2}\phi[/math] (Laplacian) অর্থাৎ শুধুমাত্র অংশীয় দ্বিতীয় ডেরিভেটিভগুলোর যোগ। গণনা করে পাওয়া যায় [math]\frac{\partial\phi}{\partial x}=6x^{2}y^{2}z^{4},\ \frac{\partial^{2}\phi}{\partial x^{2}}=12xy^{2}z^{4},\ \frac{\partial^{2}\phi}{\partial y^{2}}=4x^{3}z^{4},\ \frac{\partial^{2}\phi}{\partial z^{2}}=24x^{3}y^{2}z^{2}[/math]. তাই [math]\nabla^{2}\phi=12xy^{2}z^{4}+4x^{3}z^{4}+24x^{3}y^{2}z^{2}[/math], যা সমাধান।

Question #482 (ID: 395672)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\phi(x, y, z)=2 x z^{4}-x^{2} y[/math] হলে [math](2,-2,-1)[/math] বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla} \phi[/math] ও [math]\m id \vec{
abla}_{\phi}\mid[/math] নির্ণয় করো ।

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
(Answer : [math]10 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-16 \hat{\mathrm{k}}[/math]
 ও [math]2 \sqrt{93}[/math]
 )[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\phi(x, y, z)=2 x z^{4}-x^{2} y \\\vec{
abla}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]
এখন,[math]\begin{aligned}\phi & =\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right) \\& \left(2 x z^{4}-x^{2} y\right) \\& =\left(2 z^{4}-2 x y\right) \hat{i}-x^{2} \hat{j}+8 x z^{3} \hat{k}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math](2,-2,-1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla}_{\phi}=\left\{2(-1)^{4}-2(2)(-2)\right\} \hat{i}-(2)^{2} \hat{j}[/math]
 [math]+\left\{8(2)(1)^{3}\right\} \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]=(2+8) \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{j}-16 \hat{k}=10 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-4 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-16 \hat{\mathrm{k}}(\text { Ans.) }[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\left|\vec{
abla}_{\phi}\right| & =\sqrt{10^{2}+(-4)^{2}+(-16)^{2}} \\& =2 \sqrt{93} \text { (Ans.) }\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:
সমাধান: সাধারণভাবে [math]\phi_x=2z^4-2xy,\;\phi_y=-x^2,\;\phi_z=8xz^3[/math], সুতরাং [math]\vec{\nabla}\phi=(2z^4-2xy,\,-x^2,\,8xz^3)[/math]। ওই বিন্দুতে যোগ করলে [math]\vec{\nabla}\phi(2,-2,-1)=(10,-4,-16)[/math] পাওয়া যায়। তার মান হচ্ছে [math]|\vec{\nabla}\phi|=\sqrt{10^2+(-4)^2+(-16)^2}=\;2\sqrt{93}[/math]।

Question #483 (ID: 395673)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
[math]\vec{A}=3 x y z^{2} \hat{\mathbf{i}}+2 x y^{3} \hat{j}-x^{2} y z \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\ phi 
eq 3 x^{2}-y z[/math] হলে [math](1,-1,1)[/math] বিন্দুতে নির্ণয় কর [math]\text { (a) } \vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{A}(\text { (b) } \vec{A} \cdot \vec{
abla} \phi(c) \vec{
abla} \cdot(\phi \vec{A}) \text { (d) } \vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{
abla} \phi[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
(Answer : (a) 4 (b) [math]-15[/math]
 (c) 1 (d) 6 )[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=3 x y z^{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 x y^{3} \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\mathrm{x}^{2} y z \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\phi=3 \mathrm{x}^{2}-\mathrm{yz} \\\vec{
abla}=\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{x}} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{\mathrm{k}}\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{i}} \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{y}} \hat{\mathrm{j}}+\frac{\partial}{\partial \mathrm{k}} \hat{\mathrm{k}}\right)[/math]
 [math]\left(3 x y z^{2} \hat{i}+2 x y^{3} \hat{j}-\right.[/math]
 [math]\left.x^{2} y z \hat{k}\right)[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x} 3 x y z^{2}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} 2 x y^{3}-\frac{\partial}{\partial z} x^{2} y z \\=3 y z^{2}+6 x y^{2}-x^{2} y\end{array}[/math]
এখন, [math](1,-1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\begin{aligned}\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{A} & =3(-1)(1)^{2}+6 \cdot 1(-1)^{2}-(1)^{2}(-1) \\& =-3+6+1=4 \text { (Ans.) }\end{aligned}[/math]
(b) [math]\begin{aligned}\vec{
abla}_{\phi} & =\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right) \cdot\left(3 x^{2}-y z\right) \\& =6 x \hat{i}-z \hat{j}-y \hat{k}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math](1,-1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{
abla}_{\phi}=6 \hat{\mathrm{i}}-\hat{\mathrm{j}}+\hat{k}[/math]
এখন,[math]\begin{aligned}\vec{A} \cdot \vec{
abla} \phi & =\left(3 x y z^{2} \hat{i}+2 x y^{3} \hat{j}-x^{2} y z \hat{k}\right) \cdot(6 \hat{i}-\hat{j}+\hat{k}) \\& =18 x y z^{2}-2 x y^{3}-x^{2} y z\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math](1,-1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে [math]\vec{A} \cdot \vec{
abla}_{\phi}=-18+2+1 \doteq-15 \text { (Ans.) }[/math]
(c),[math]\begin{aligned}\phi \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} & =\left(3 x^{2}-y z\right)\left(3 x y z^{2} \hat{i}+2 x y^{3} \hat{j}-x^{2} y z \hat{k}\right) \\& =\left(9 x^{3} y z^{2}-3 x y^{2} z^{3}\right) \hat{i}+\left(6 x^{3} y^{3}-2 x y^{4} z\right) \hat{j}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]+\left(-3 x^{4} y z+x^{2} y^{2} z^{2}\right) \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\vec{
abla} \cdot(\phi \vec{A})=\frac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(9 x^{3} y z^{2}-3 x y^{2} z^{3}\right)+\frac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(6 x^{3} y^{3}-2 x y^{4} z\right)[/math]
 [math]+\frac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(-3 x^{4} y z+x^{2} y^{2} z^{2}\right)[/math]
 [math]=27 x^{2} y z^{2}-3 y^{2} z^{3}+18 x^{3} y^{2}-8 x y^{3} z-3 x^{4} y+2 x^{2} y^{2} z[/math]
 [math](1,-1,1)[/math]
 বিন্দুতে ,[math]\begin{aligned}\vec{
abla} \cdot(\phi \overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}) & =-27-3+18+8+3+2 \\& =-30+31=1 \text { (Ans.) }\end{aligned}[/math]
(d),[math]\begin{aligned}\vec{
abla}_{\phi} & =\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right) \cdot\left(3 x^{2}-y z\right) \\& =6 x \hat{i}-z \hat{j}-y \hat{k}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\vec{
abla} \cdot \vec{
abla} \phi & =\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x} \hat{i}+\frac{\partial}{\partial y} \hat{j}+\frac{\partial}{\partial z} \hat{k}\right) \cdot(6 x \hat{i}-z \hat{j}-y \hat{k}) \\& =6-0+0=6 \text { (Ans.) }\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা:

ক [math]\nabla\cdot\vec{A}=\partial_x(3xyz^2)+\partial_y(2xy^3)+\partial_z(-x^2yz)=3yz^2+6xy^2-x^2y[/math], তাই [math](1,-1,1)[/math]-এ [math] -3+6+1=4[/math]। 

খ 먼저 [math]\nabla\phi=(6x)\hat{i}-z\hat{j}-y\hat{k}[/math], তাই [math]\vec{A}\cdot\nabla\phi=18x^2yz^2-2xy^3z+x^2y^2z[/math] এবং [math](1,-1,1)[/math]-এ মান = [math]-18+2+1=-15[/math]। 

গ [math]\nabla\cdot(\phi\vec{A})=\vec{A}\cdot\nabla\phi+\phi(\nabla\cdot\vec{A})[/math]; এখানে [math]\phi(1,-1,1)=3(1)^2-(-1)(1)=4[/math], ফলে [math]-15+4\cdot4=1[/math]। 

ঘ [math]\nabla\cdot\nabla\phi=\nabla^2\phi=\partial_{xx}\phi+\partial_{yy}\phi+\partial_{zz}\phi[/math]; [math]\phi=3x^2-yz[/math] থেকে [math]\nabla^2\phi=6[/math] (সব ক্ষেত্রে একই)।

Question #484 (ID: 395674)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
a এর কোন মানের জন্য ভেক্টর A ও B পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হবে যেখানে [math]\vec{A}=5 \hat{i}+2 \ hat{j}-3 \hat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{\mathrm{B}}=15 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+a \hat{\mathrm{j}}-9 \hat{k}[/math]

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : [math]-8 t^{3}+12 t^{2}-2 t[/math]
 , [math]\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(4 \mathrm{t}^{3}-4 \mathrm{t}-1\right)+\hat{\mathrm{j}}\left(5 \mathrm{t}^{4}+20 \mathrm{t}+5\right)+\hat{\mathrm{k}}\left(3 \mathrm{t}^{2}+10 \mathrm{t}\right)[/math]
 )[math]\\[/math]
Solution :এখানে,[math]\begin{array}{l}\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}}=5 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+2 \hat{\mathrm{j}}-3 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}=15 \hat{\mathrm{i}}+\hat{\mathrm{a}}-9 \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\\mathrm{a}=?\end{array}[/math]
আমরা জানি,[math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{\mathrm{i}} & \hat{\mathrm{j}} & \hat{\mathrm{k}} \\5 & 2 & -3 \\15 & \mathrm{a} & -9\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\hat{i}(-18+3 a)-\hat{j}(-45+45)+\hat{k}(5 a-30) \\=(3 a-18) \hat{i}+(5 a-30) \hat{k}\end{array}[/math]
এখন, [math]\vec{A}[/math]
 ও [math]\vec{B}[/math]
 পরস্পর সমান্তরাল হবে যদি [math]|\vec{A} \times \vec{B}|=0[/math]
 হয়।[math]\begin{aligned}\therefore & \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\vec{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \vec{\mathrm{B}})=? \\& \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\vec{A} \times \vec{B})=?\end{aligned}[/math]
এখন ,[math]\begin{aligned}\vec{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \vec{\mathrm{B}} & =\mathrm{A}_{x} \mathrm{~B}_{x}+\mathrm{A}_{y} \mathrm{~B}_{y}+\mathrm{A}_{z} \mathrm{~B}_{z} \\& =\left(\mathrm{t}^{2}\right)(5 \mathrm{t})+(-\mathrm{t})(\mathrm{t})+(2 \mathrm{t}+1)\left(-\mathrm{t}^{3}\right) \\& =5 \mathrm{t}^{3}-\mathrm{t}^{2}-2 \mathrm{t}^{4}-\mathrm{t}^{3}=-2 \mathrm{t}^{4}+4 \mathrm{t}^{3}-\mathrm{t}^{2}\end{aligned}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\therefore \frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}(\overrightarrow{\mathrm{A}} \cdot \overrightarrow{\mathrm{B}}) & =\frac{\mathrm{d}}{\mathrm{dt}}\left(-2 \mathrm{t}^{4}+4 \mathrm{t}^{3}-\mathrm{t}^{2}\right) \\& =-2 \times 4 t^{3}+4 \times\left(3 t^{2}\right)-2 t=-8 t^{3}+12 t^{2}-2 t \text { (Ans.) }\end{aligned}[/math]
আবার,[math]\vec{A} \times \vec{B}=\left|\begin{array}{ccc}\hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\t^{2} & -t & (2 t+1) \\5 t & t & -t^{3}\end{array}\right|[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\hat{i}\left\{(-t)\left(-t^{3}\right)-(2 t+1) t\right\}-\hat{j}\left\{\left(t^{2}\right)\left(-t^{3}\right)\right. \\\quad-(2 t+1)(5 t)\}+\hat{k}\left\{\left(t^{2}\right)(t)-(-t)(5 t)\right\} \\=\hat{i}\left(t^{4}-2 t^{2}-t\right)-\hat{j}\left(-t^{5}-10 t^{2}-5 t\right)+\hat{k}\left(t^{3}+5 t^{2}\right)\end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\therefore \frac{d}{d t} & (\vec{A} \times \vec{B}) \\& =\frac{d}{d t}\left\{\hat{i}\left(t^{4}-2 t^{2}-t\right)-\hat{j}\left(-t^{5}-10 t^{2}-5 t\right)+\hat{k}\left(t^{3}+5 t^{2}\right)\right\} \\& =\hat{\mathrm{i}}\left(4 t^{3}-4 \cdot t-1\right)-\hat{j}\left(-5 t^{4}-20 t-5\right)+\hat{k}\left(3 t^{2}+10 t\right) \\& =\hat{i}\left(4 t^{3}-4 t-1\right)+\hat{j}\left(5 t^{4}+20 t+5\right)+\hat{k}\left(3 t^{2}+10 \mathrm{t}\right)(A n s .)\end{aligned}[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: ভেক্টর দুইটি সমান্তরাল হলে একটিকে অপরটির ধ্রুবক গুণক হিসেবে লেখা যায়। এখানে [math]\vec{A}=5\hat{i}+2\hat{j}-3\hat{k}[/math], [math]\vec{B}=15\hat{i}+a\hat{j}-9\hat{k}[/math]; তাই [math]15=5k\Rightarrow k=3[/math]. গতিরূপে [math]a=2k=6[/math], এবং [math]-9=-3k[/math] দিয়েও একই [math]k=3[/math] পাওয়া যায়, ফলে [math]a=6[/math]।

Question #485 (ID: 395675)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years:  | Boards:  | Tags: Important
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
একটি বস্তুকণার অবস্থান [math]x=\left(3.0 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2}\right) t+\left(2.0 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) t[/math] এবং [math]y=\left(2 m^{-2}\right) t^{2}+\left(4 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) t[/math] দ্বারা বর্ণনা করা যায়।

(i) বস্তুকণার বেগ এবং ত্বরণ ভেক্টর কত ?

(ii) ত্বরণ ভেক্টর এর মান ও দিক কী হবে ?

Options:


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
( Answer : (i) [math]6 \hat{i}+4 \hat{j}[/math]
 (ii) [math]7.2 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2}[/math]
 , [math]33.7^{\circ}[/math]
 )[math]\\[/math]
Solution :দেওয়া আছে,[math]x=\left(3.0 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2}\right) t^{2}+\left(2.0 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right)[/math]
 tএবং [math]y=\left(2{m s^{-2}}^{-2}\right) t^{2}+\left(4 \mathrm{~ms}^{-1}\right) t[/math]
(i) [math]\overrightarrow{v_{x}}=\frac{d x}{d t}=(6 t+2) \mathrm{ms}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\vec{v}_{y}=\frac{d y}{d t}=(4 t+4) \mathrm{ms}^{-1}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \vec{v}=\overrightarrow{v_{x}}+\overrightarrow{v_{y}}=(6 t+2) \hat{i}+(4 t+4) \hat{j}[/math]
এবং [math]\overrightarrow{a_{x}}=\frac{d v_{x}}{d t}=6 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2}[/math]
 [math]\begin{aligned}\quad\overrightarrow{a_y}&=\frac{dv_{\dot{y}}}{dt}=4\cdot\mathrm{ms}^{-2}\\\therefore\overrightarrow{a^{ }}=&\overrightarrow{a_x}+\overrightarrow{a_y}=6\hat{i}+4\hat{j}\end{aligned}[/math]
(ii) ত্বরণ ভেক্টরের মান [math]=|\vec{a}|=a=\sqrt{\left.(6)^{2}+(4)^{2}\right)}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l}=\sqrt{36+16} \\=\sqrt{52}=7.2 \mathrm{~ms}^{-2} \text { (Ans.) }\end{array}[/math]
আবার, [math]\tan \theta=\frac{a_{y}}{a_{x}}[/math]
 [math]\Rightarrow[/math]
 [math]\tan \theta=\frac{4}{6}[/math]
 [math]\therefore \theta=\tan ^{-1}\left(\frac{4}{6}\right)=33.7^{\circ} \text { (Ans.) }[/math]


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: স্থানবিকরণ থেকে গুণগত ডেরিভেটিভ নিলে বেগের উপাদানগুলো পাওয়া যায়, তাই ধরে নিলে [math]x=(3.0\ \mathrm{m\,s^{-2}})t^{2}+(2.0\ \mathrm{m\,s^{-1}})t[/math] এবং [math]y=(2.0\ \mathrm{m\,s^{-2}})t^{2}+(4.0\ \mathrm{m\,s^{-1}})t[/math], তখন  
[math]\vec v=\frac{d\vec r}{dt}=(6.0t+2.0)\hat i+(4.0t+4.0)\hat j\ \mathrm{m/s}[/math] এবং  
[math]\vec a=\frac{d\vec v}{dt}=6.0\hat i+4.0\hat j\ \mathrm{m/s^{2}}[/math].  
ত্বরণের মান ও দিক: [math]|\vec a|=\sqrt{6^{2}+4^{2}}=\sqrt{52}=2\sqrt{13}\approx7.21\ \mathrm{m/s^{2}},\quad \theta=\tan^{-1}\!\left(\frac{4}{6}\right)=\tan^{-1}\!\left(\frac{2}{3}\right)\approx33.7^\circ[/math].

Sub-Questions:

Question #486 (ID: 395607)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years: 2021 | Boards: Barisal Board | Tags: Barisal Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
নিচের উদ্দীপকটি লক্ষ্য করো যেখানে ত্রিমাত্রিক স্থানাংক ব্যবস্থায় [math]\rm{A} (3, 3, 1)[/math] এবং [math]\rm{B} (4, 5, 1)[/math] দুটি বিন্দু।

[Image]


Options:
ঘ. [math]\text{O, A ও B}[/math] বিন্দুসমূহের সংযোগে গঠিত ত্রিভুজটি একটি সমকোণী ত্রিভুজ কি না— গাণিতিক বিশ্লেষণপূর্বক তোমার মতামত দাও।


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
ঘ [math]\rm{Answer~:}[/math] সমকোণী নয়।

Explanation:
ঘ না — কারণ O(0,0,0), [math]\vec{OA}=(3,3,1)[/math], [math]\vec{OB}=(4,5,1)[/math], [math]\vec{AB}=(1,2,0)[/math]. [math]\vec{OA}\cdot\vec{OB}=28,\ \vec{OA}\cdot\vec{AB}=9,\ \vec{OB}\cdot\vec{AB}=14[/math] এবং কোনো ডট প্রোডাক্ট শূন্য নয়, তাই কোন দুই ভেক্টরের মধ্যেকার কোণ ৯০° নয়। বিকল্পভাবে [math]OA^2=19,\ OB^2=42,\ AB^2=5[/math] এবং কোনো দুইটির যোগ তৃতীয়টির সমান না—অতএব ত্রিভুজটি সমকোণী নয়।

Question #487 (ID: 395608)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
তিনটি ভেক্টর রাশি যথাক্রমে [math]\vec{A}=4 \widehat{i}+3 \widehat{j}+5 \hat{k}, \vec{B}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \widehat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\vec{C}=x^{2} y \hat{i}+y^{2} z \hat{j}+z^{2} x \widehat{k}[/math]

Options:
ঘ. উদ্দীপকের [math]\vec{C}[/math] ভেক্টরের কার্লের ডাইভারজেন্স শূন্য হবে কি? গাণিতিকভাবে বিশ্লেষণ কর ।


Correct Answer: 

Solution:


Explanation:
ব্যাখ্যা: ঘ যেকোনো পর্যাপ্ত মসৃণ ভেক্টর ক্ষেত্রের জন্য সাধারণ পরিচিতি হল [math]\nabla\cdot(\nabla\times \mathbf{F})=0[/math]। সঙ্ক্ষিপ্তভাবে, যদি [math]\mathbf{F}=(P,Q,R)[/math] হয় তাহলে
[math]\nabla\cdot(\nabla\times\mathbf{F})=\partial_x(R_y-Q_z)+\partial_y(P_z-R_x)+\partial_z(Q_x-P_y)[/math]
এবং মিলিত মিশ্র ভাগীয় অনুপাতগুলোর কারণে সব চিহ্নযুক্ত পদগুলো পরস্পর নেবে, ফলে ফলাফল শূন্য হয়; দেওয়া [math]\vec{C}[/math] পলিনোমিয়াল হওয়ার কারণে এই শর্তগুলো পূরণ করে, সুতরাং তার কার্লের ডাইভারজেন্স শূন্য।

Sub-Questions:

================================================================================
Question #488 (ID: 395609)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type: CQ | Book: পদার্থ বিজ্ঞান ১ম পত্র | Years: 2019 | Boards: Chittagong Board | Tags: Chattogram Board
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Question:
তিনটি ভেক্টর রাশি যথাক্রমে [math]\overrightarrow{A}=4 \widehat{i}+3 \widehat{j}+5 \hat{k}, \overrightarrow{B}=2 \hat{i}+\hat{j}+2 \widehat{k}[/math] এবং [math]\overrightarrow{C}=x^{2} y \hat{i}+y^{2} z \hat{j}+z^{2} x \widehat{k}[/math]

Options:
ঘ. উদ্দীপকের [math]\overrightarrow{C}[/math] ভেক্টরের কার্লের ডাইভারজেন্স শূন্য হবে কি? গাণিতিকভাবে বিশ্লেষণ কর।


Correct Answer: 

Solution:
ঘএখানে [math]\overrightarrow{C}=x^{2} y \hat{i}+y^{2} z \hat{j}+z^{2} x \hat{k}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l} \overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}}=\overrightarrow{
abla} \times \overrightarrow{\mathrm{C}} \\ \hspace{1.5 cm} =\left|\begin{array}{ccc} \hat{i} & \hat{j} & \hat{k} \\ \dfrac{\partial}{\partial x} & \dfrac{\partial}{\partial y} & \dfrac{\partial}{\partial z} \\ x^{2} y & y^{2} z & z^{2} x \end{array}\right| \\ \hspace{1.5 cm}=\hat{i}\left\{\dfrac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(z^{2} x\right)-\dfrac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(y^{2} z\right)\right\} -\hat{j}\left\{\dfrac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(z^{2} x\right)-\dfrac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(x^{2} y\right)\right\} +\hat{k}\left\{\dfrac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(y^{2} z\right)-\dfrac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(x^{2} y\right)\right\} \\ \hspace{1.5 cm} =\hat{i}\left\{0-y^{2}\right\}-\hat{j}\left\{z^{2}-0\right\}+\hat{k}\left\{0-x^{2}\right\} \\ \hspace{1.5 cm} =-y^{2} \hat{i}-z^{2} \hat{j}-x^{2} \hat{k} \end{array}[/math]
 [math]\begin{array}{l} \therefore \operatorname{div}(\overrightarrow{
abla} \times \overrightarrow{C})=\overrightarrow{
abla} \cdot(\overrightarrow{
abla} \times \overrightarrow{C}) \\ \hspace{1.5 cm} =\left(\hat{i} \dfrac{\partial}{\partial x}+\hat{j} \dfrac{\partial}{\partial y}+\hat{\mathrm{k}} \dfrac{\partial}{\partial z}\right) \cdot\left(-y^{2} \hat{\mathrm{i}}-z^{2} \hat{\mathrm{j}}-\mathrm{x}^{2} \hat{\mathrm{k}}\right) \\ \hspace{1.5 cm}=-\left\{\dfrac{\partial}{\partial x}\left(y^{2}\right)+\dfrac{\partial}{\partial y}\left(z^{2}\right)+\dfrac{\partial}{\partial z}\left(x^{2}\right)\right\} \\ \hspace{1.5 cm} =-\{0+0+0\}=0 \end{array}[/math]
অতএব, উদ্দীপকের [math]\overrightarrow{\rm{C}}[/math]
 ভেক্টরের কার্পের ডাইভারজেন্স শূন্য।

Explanation:
ঘ হ্যাঁ — সাধারণ তত্ত্ব অনুযায়ী [math]\nabla\cdot(\nabla\times\mathbf{C})=0[/math]।  
[math]\nabla\cdot(\nabla\times\mathbf{C})=\partial_x(\partial_y C_z-\partial_z C_y)+\partial_y(\partial_z C_x-\partial_x C_z)+\partial_z(\partial_x C_y-\partial_y C_x)=0[/math] কারণ মিশ্র আংশিক উৎপন্নকারীগণ সমান ([math]\partial_x\partial_y=\partial_y\partial_x[/math]) এবং এখানে উপাদানসমূহ পলিনোমিয়াল হওয়ায় দ্বিতীয় আংশিকগুলি অবিচ্ছিন্ন।

Sub-Questions:
